title: Thomas Edison National Historical Park: Photos
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Edison Talking Doll Recordings, 1888-1890     Photos                Edison Talking Doll - Photographs                    Historic images of the Edison Talking Doll   9 Photos  Historic photographs of the Edison Talking Doll, and drawings from Scientific American magazine, April 26, 1890.          Scanning a doll cylinder at Northeast Document Conservation Center, August 27, 2014.   11 Photos  Photos of work to scan Thomas Edison National Historical Park's "Twinkle, twinkle little star" brown wax cylinder at Northeast Document Conservation Center, August 27, 2014.
